EmailTemplate.subject: Do You Follow These 4 Virtualization Best Practices {{lead.first name:default=Today}}?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUT DATA CENTER COSTS LIKE AWS: MANAGING THE ECONOMICS OF YOUR VIRTUALIZED DATA CENTER A FREE VMTURBO WHITEPAPER
Download Here: <http://bit.ly/1dUDu07> {{lead.first name:default=Today}}, you could get 20-40% more from your existing infrastructure, so why aren't you? As cloud economics threaten the long-term viability of on-premise data centers, the survival of IT organizations rests solely in the ability to maximize the operational and financial returns of their existing infrastructure.
You want to survive, and this brand new whitepaper will help you answer these 4 questions:
- How efficient is my virtualized data center? - How do I optimize workload placement within my clusters? - How do I reclaim unused server capacity? - How do I show my boss that this saves money?
READ NOW <http://bit.ly/1dUDu07> More Downloads <http://bit.ly/1jZSEF3> More Whitepapers <http://bit.ly/1rLGipF> <http://bit.ly/1myEcZ3>
